job description:
Earny is seeking a highly-motivated individual to participate in our fast-paced paid Fall internship program.

Who we are:

With one click Earny (www.earny.co) gets you money! Earny is a personal assistant that automatically gets you money back on almost every purchase. Earny uses low-latency price tracking to identify the lowest possible prices, and obtains refunds using credit card price protection.

Every year, online shoppers in the US lose 50 billion dollars in unclaimed money, and weve developed an elegant way of returning that money back to our customers. Our simple customer experience means sophisticated back-end decision-making on their behalf.

Were currently looking for innovative and passionate people, who are eager to make a difference and play a vital role in Earnys growth and success.

Responsibilities:
  • Assist with improving our ongoing reporting and analysis processes, automating or simplifying self-service support for secondary datasets
  • Assist with creating and maintaining dashboards, which provide insights to make business decisions and drive new multichannel initiatives
  • Assist with document specs for web and mobile app tracking tags
  • Assist in all stages of experimental A/B testing.
Preferred Qualifications:
  • Experience with data analysis
  • Experience working in SQL with the ability to work on large data sets and writing MS SQL queries
  • Independent and able to get things done
  • Team player
  • Resourceful and desire to work and learn at a swifter than normally acceptable pace.
